835140.name: 0°N 0°W VR
835140.description:
The VR edition of 0°N 0°W is being developed in an open alpha format, giving you a chance to jump into these surreal worlds right away! Participate in the development journey by downloading this free DLC that enables VR support for Oculus headsets.



This updated alpha (Jun 24, 19) introduces 8 worlds to explore and was premiered in the Indie Megabooth's PAX East 2019 showcase! There's the retro Neon City, a beautiful Tron like CAD construct full of abstracted skyscrapers and doodle like forests. The bright Deconstructivist City, with towering shapes and labyrinthine alleys. The Desert Canyon, a wonderful oasis whose ancient ruins defy gravity. The Tropic Island, rendered in a cacophony of primary colors. And 4 Edge worlds that truly bend the senses.

Controls:





Use the left joystick to move around the worlds, left index trigger to sprint and right index finger to jump. The right joystick will hard rotate your view by 45 degrees. You can move forward in whichever direction that you are looking at in the physical world.

Keyboard Dev Menu:





The Developer access keys let you force load multiple different worlds as well as Quit the game. When loading a world it will randomly choose from a variety of possible starting locations.

Important:



  • Only compatible with Oculus Headsets at the moment.
  • Intended for a seated or standing experience.
  • For use with Oculus Touch Controllers.
  • This is still an alpha, as such there are a few bugs and discrepancies with the PC version.
  • If you run into any problems, bugs or want to actively participate in the development process please feel free to post in the VR discussion board!
  • To play the original experimental SteamVR compatible alpha, you can re-enable it from the game's Properties Beta Options, and is listed as "vive - SteamVR". The launcher option will not work so you have to manually access this VR edition: open the 0N0WVR.exe in the VR folder found inside your game's installation directory.
